Filter.description: One or more filters.    instance-family - The instance family (e.g., m4).    payment-option - The payment option (No Upfront | Partial Upfront | All Upfront).    state - The state of the reservation (payment-pending | payment-failed | active | retired).

HostReservationIdSet.description: One or more host reservation IDs.

MaxResults.description: The maximum number of results to return for the request in a single page. The remaining results can be seen by sending another request with the returned nextToken value. This value can be between 5 and 500; if maxResults is given a larger value than 500, you will receive an error.

NextToken.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results.
